Amazon is back with some more great deals on Apple products, with one of the best deals being the M2 MacBook Air 13″ model for just $799 in the 16GB / 256GB configuration, taking $200 off the retail price.

And if the M2 MacBook Air isn’t what you’re looking for, the M3 models remain at discount, as well as great deals on iPad mini 7, AirPods, and more.

M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $799

Amazon has the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 for the 16GB RAM / 256GB storage model, a 20% discount from MSRP. The M2 chip is the prior generation chip, but it’s still plenty speedy and capable, has Apple Intelligence support, and makes this a great Mac for a great discounted price.

  • M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – $799 (down from $999)

M3 MacBook Air 13″ & 15″ for $200 Off Retail

The M3 MacBook Air comes in either 13″ or 15″ LCD display, Apple Intelligence support, 16GB RAM standard, center-stage front camera, fantastic battery life, and is available in a variety of color options. Take $200 off the retail price from Amazon right now with these great deals.

13″ MacBook Air M3

  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $899 (down $200 from $1099)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1099 (down from $1299)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499)

15″ MacBook Air M3

  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $1099 (down $200 from $1299)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1499 (down $200 from $1699)

iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

iPad mini 7 features the A17 processor with support for Apple Intelligence, an 8″ LCD display, 12MP front and rear cameras, 128GB storage, Apple Pencil Pro support, and USB-C charging. Take $100 off the retail price at Amazon in select colors right now!

  • iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

AirPods are wildly popular wireless headphones, and AirPods 4 include gesture support, Spatial Audio, voice isolation, water resistance, great battery life, Siri commands, USB-C charging, and more.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129)
